summary: A vast selection of introduction overhauls, for every theme suited to your preference!
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]https://images.cooltext.com/4785937.png[/img]
[size=4][b]Whatever your theme, I can match it.[/b][/size][/center][center][line]
Welcome to the new and improved version of 'Fantasy Intro Overhaul'. You'll notice that it's now called 'Fantasy Intro Overhaul[u]s[/u]', but the 's' isn't the only new and incredibly exciting feature! Rather than a mere single fantasy theme, I decided to make more. One will be released each week, so be sure to look out for one that suits your game best. If you can't find it, feel free to make a request. I'm more likely to grant somebody their wish rather than just making one on the fly and hoping somebody likes it. This mod will change the introductory Bethesda logo, the main menu background and the main theme. They are all compatible with any version of Skyrim, with or without DLC.

Please note that the backgrounds only support 16:9 aspect ratios, unless users provide versions themselves. If so, they will be credited. I apologise for the inconvenience, but I have very little time on my hands making one a week, let alone 2.

[font=Georgia][color=#0000ff][size=5]Instillation-
[/size][/color][/font]
Download your preferred version using a mod manager (recommended)
OR
1. Install your desired version manually
2. Extract the 'data' folder to your main Skyrim directory (where the TESV.exe is located)

[font=Times New Roman][color=#0000ff][size=5]Regarding copyright-
[/size][/color]
[/font][size=2]Before allegations of theft and discrepancy are aimed towards me by angry keyboard warriors in the comments, all music used in the menus are ROYALTY-FREE SOUNDTRACKS. Whether the creators request crediting or not, they WILL be given credit below and in the 'credits' tab. If available, a direct link will be provided to the source of the audio used.
[/size]
[font=Times New Roman][color=#0000ff][size=5]Currently available themes-
[/size][/color][/font]
[size=2]Below is a list of every available theme, alongside the name of the track used and credits for their composition. I have also taken the time to create a video for each so that you know exactly what you are downloading.[/size]
[size=2]   [/size]
[img]https://images.cooltext.com/4785946.png[/img]

[/font]

[size=5]THANK YOU ALL SO MUCH FOR THE SUPPORT, AND FOR USING THE MOD! [/size]

author: Thresh Productions
